text: An order of merit is conferred by a state, government or royal family on an individual in recognition of military or civil merit. Order of merit may also refer to: * FIFA Order of Merit, for significant contribution to association football * PDC Order of Merit, a world ranking system by the Professional Darts Corporation ==See also== * Order of Military Merit (disambiguation) * Order of Naval Merit (disambiguation) * Order of Civil Merit (disambiguation) * Cross of Merit (disambiguation) * Medal of Merit (disambiguation) * Order (distinction) * Socialist orders of merit * Legion of Merit, a military award of the United States Armed Forces
title: Order of merit (disambiguation)
